using namespace std;

typedef long long int ll;
typedef pair<int,int> pii;

const ll mod = 1e9+7;
const int SIZE = 1e2+5;
const ll inf = 0x7fffffff;
ll a,b,r;

void solve(int n)
{
    string res="";
    while(n!=0)
    {
        res=(char)(n%7+'0')+res;
        n/=7;
    }
    cout<<res<<endl;
}
int main()
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(0);
    int n;
    cin>>n;
    while(n!=-1)
    {
        solve(n);
        cin>>n;
    }
    return 0;}
